entry.title: Dlux Pro Academy Russian Volume Course
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lash for Less
Type: training
Price: 500.00

$995+ tax

($500 deposit required)

 

 

Have you been thinking about taking the next step in your lash career? Then Dlux Pro Academy's Russian Volume Course is what you need.  We pride ourselves in staying up to date in the newest lash trends and techniques and this is what we design our course around. 

Our one day Russian Volume course is designed for Lash Artists who have already completed their training in Classic Lashes, and are wanting to increase their skill level.  With training in Volume Lash Artistry Artists can expect to be able to see not only their client list increase but also their profits. By being able to offer a larger variety of services and lash styles. Upon completion of this volume course Artists can expect to be able to cater to a larger variety of clients.

With this course Artists will be trained in proper lash fan creation, placement and adhering. With focus on design, symmetry, client safety and retention.  After completion of this course the student will be certified in Volume Lash Artistry. 

Our Lash trainers have both trained students over seas and locally.  Having both trained under some of the largest Volume Lash artists in North America, Europe and Asia they provide years of experience in both Volume lash Artistry and Russian Volume. Dlux Pro Academy prides itself on a lifetime of mentorship for their students. After course completion trainers are available to students for follow up advice and questions via phone/email/text. Our focus is having properly trained volume students who are able to provide high quality lashes that focus on client health and safety. 

 

Students will have 24/7 Access to the Dlux Professional Academy Student Portal.  Via the Portal students will have access to all of our Volume Training videos that cover all the topics in the Volume Manual. A hard copy of the volume manual is also provided to students for them to have on hand. 

 

 Students must also have completed a classic lash extension course and hold a valid Classic Eyelash Extension certificate. It is also recommended that students have adequate hours completed in classic training and have a good handle on isolation and placement.

 

Course  includes 

  • Hard Copy of Manual
  • Volume Certificate upon completion
  • Lifetime of Mentorship from our Lash Trainers
  • Volume Lash Training Kit full of Lashing essentials valued over $200
  • Two sets of curved hand tested tweezers
  • Ultra Fine Mink Volume Lashes
  • Black Volume Adhesive
  • Lifetime 10% Discount at www.lashforless.com/DLUXPRO.ca
  • 24/7 Access to Dlux Professional Academy Student Portal
  • Option to take additional Lash Lifting Training at discounted rate.

CANCELLATION POLICY

$500 nonrefundable deposit is required to hold spot  Remaining tuition due prior to course start date.

Tuition is refundable (minus $500 deposit) up to 2 weeks prior to course start date.

Cancellations that are made prior to the 2 week mark are eligible to be rescheduled at a $150 administration fee which is subject to future course availability. 

 

 Tuition can be paid in installments. Please contact info@lashforless.com for more information.

entry.title: Dlux Pro Academy Online Russian Volume Course
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lash for Less
Type: training
Price: 325.00 - 450.00 (2 variants)

$650/$795+ tax

 

 

Have you been thinking about taking the next step in your lash career? Then Dlux Pro Academy's Online Russian Volume Course is what you need.  We pride ourselves in staying up to date in the newest lash trends and techniques and this is what we design our course around. 

Our Online Russian Volume course is designed for Lash Artists who have already completed their training in Classic Lashes, and are wanting to increase their skill level.  With training in Volume Lash Artistry Artists can expect to be able to see not only their client list increase but also their profits. By being able to offer a larger variety of services and lash styles. Upon completion of this volume course Artists can expect to be able to cater to a larger variety of clients.

With this course Artists will be trained in proper lash fan creation, placement and adhereing. With focus on design, symmetry, client safety and retention.  After completion of this course the student will be certified in Volume Lash Artistry. 

Our Lash trainers have both trained students over seas and locally.  Having both trained under some of the largest Volume Lash artists in North America, Europe and Asia they provide years of experiance in both Volume lash Artistry and Russian Volume. Dlux Pro Academy prides itself on a lifetime of mentorship for their students. After course completion trainers are available to students for follow up advice and questions via phone/email/text. Our focus is having properly trained volume students who are able to provide high quality lashes that focus on client health and safety. 

 

Students will have 24/7 Access to the Dlux Professional Academy Student Portal.  Using this portal students can study at whatever pace suits their lifestyle. Via the Portal students will have access to all of our Volume Training videos that cover all the topics in the Volume Manual. A hard copy of the volume manual is also shipped to students for them to have on hand. Lash Artists complete the certification process by submitting photos to the Dlux Master Trainers for evaluation. 

 

 Students must also have completed a classic lash extension course and hold a valid Classic Eyelash Extension certificate. It is also recommended that students have adequate hours completed in classic training and have a good handle on isolation and placement.

 Course Without Kit includes ($650)

  • Hard Copy of Manual
  • Volume Certificate upon completion
  • Lifetime of Mentorship from our Lash Trainers
  • 24/7 Access to Dlux Academy Student Portal
  • Lifetime 10% Discount at www.lashforless.com/DLUXPRO.ca
  • Option to take additional Lash Lifting Training at discounted rate.
  • (Students are recommended to purchase a pair of volume tweezers separately in order to complete the course as well as a tray of 0.07mm lashes to practice with) 

 

Course With Kit includes ($795)

  • Hard Copy of Manual
  • Volume Certificate upon completion
  • Lifetime of Mentorship from our Lash Trainers
  • Volume Lash Training Kit full of Lashing essentials valued over $200
  • Two sets of curved hand tested tweezers
  • Ultra Fine Mink Volume Lashes
  • Black Volume Adhesive
  • Lifetime 10% Discount at www.lashforless.com/DLUXPRO.ca
  • 24/7 Access to Dlux Professional Academy Student Portal
  • Option to take additional Lash Lifting Training at discounted rate.

CANCELLATION POLICY

Course can not be refunded once course material access is provided/shipped

 

 Tuition can be paid in installments. Please contact info@lashforless.com for more information.

entry.title: Private Lash Lift Training
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lash for Less
Type: training
Price: 495.00

TO TAKE THIS TRAINING, TECHNICIAN MUST BE EYELASH EXTENSION CERTIFIED OR LIFT CERTIFIED BEFORE.

 

Lash lifting is one of the most popular procedures to come onto the eyelashing market. Lash lifts are an affordable, low maintenance option for clients wanting a natural look and curl to their lashes. Lift results last 6-8 weeks depending on a clients lash cycle. The Flawless Curl lift kit has been designed to offer a safe way to curl your clients lashes, while still nourishing them and avoiding possible chemical damage that can happen with some kits on the market today. 

The course and Kit contain:

Private one on one Lash Lift Training with a Certified Dlux Professional Master Lash Trainer.  Private training takes place In Sherwood Park, AB only on Sundays or Mondays.  Once Private training is purchased a date can be arranged with the trainers by contacting training@lashforless.com Students are required to arrange a model.  

Course is 4 hours Long and only requires one day of training. (Either a Sunday or Monday)

Certification in Lash Lift after completion and evaluation by certified trainer.

The Flawless Curl Lift Kit includes:

  • 15 Flawless Perm Solutions
  • 15 Flawless Perm Fixers
  • 15 Flawless Perm Essence (Nourishing Oil)
  • 5 pairs of Small/Medium/Large Silicon Shields
  • 1 bottle Dlux Flawless Crystal Clear Adhesive 

All other tools and products sold separately  NOT ELIGIBLE FOR COUPON CODE DISCOUNTS

 

How to Use:

Lash For Less and Dlux Professional Canada offer an online training course to instruct technicians on how to properly use the Flawless Curl Kit. After completing the online training students will submit images to LFL certified trainers and be given either a pass or fail.  Upon completion an LFL Lash Lift Certificate will be mailed to you signed by one of our Master Lash Trainers. The course comes complete with an entire Flawless Curl Lift Kit. 

 This course is non refundable once purchased. No exceptions

entry.title: Private Russian Volume Training
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lash for Less
Type: training
Price: 1450.00

$1450 + tax

  *PRIVATE TRAINING IS AVAILABLE IN ALBERTA ONLY.  

NOTE:  AFTER PURCHASING TRAINER WILL BE IN CONTACT WITH YOU TO ARRANGE DAYS TO COVER YOUR PRIVATE COURSE. Contact info@lashforless.com if you would like to confirm date availability. 

This private course is perfect for anyone wanting a more one on one approach to Russian Volume training.  ONE DAY REQUIRED FOR CERTIFICATION

 

Have you been thinking about taking the next step in your lash career? Then Lash For Less's Russian Volume Course is what you need.  We pride ourselves in staying up to date in the newest lash trends and techniques and this is what we design our course around. 

Our Russian Volume course is designed for Lash Artists who have already completed their training in Classic Lashes, and are wanting to increase their skill level.  With training in Volume Lash Artistry Artists can expect to be able to see not only their client list increase but also their profits. By being able to offer a larger variety of services and lash styles. Upon completion of this volume course Artists can expect to be able to cater to a larger variety of clients.

With this course Artists will be trained in proper lash fan creation, placement and adhereing. With focus on design, symmetry, client safety and retention.  After completion of this course the student will be certified in Volume Lash Artistry. 

Our Lash trainers have both trained students over seas and locally.  Having both trained under some of the largest Volume Lash artists in North America, Europe and Asia they provide years of experiance in both Volume lash Artistry and Russian Volume. Lash For Less prides itself on a lifetime of mentorship for their students. After course completion trainers are available to students for follow up advice and questions via phone/email/text. Our focus is having properly trained volume students who are able to provide high quality lashes that focus on client health and safety. 

 

This one day course runs from approximately 10am-5pm. With class Location to be disclosed closer to course date. Email with Course outline is emailed 3 weeks prior to date.

No Model is required. Our trainers have found that with volume training it is more important to focus on proper fan creation and placement. With the use of mannequins students are able to focus more on building their skill instead of worrying about completing a full set on a live model.  This same training method is utilized by the top trainers worldwide. 

Students are required to bring their own tweezers and any other essentials they require for classic lashing. Students must also have completed a classic lash extension course and hold a valid Classic Eyelash Extension certificate. It is also recommended that students have adequate hours completed in classic training and have a good handle on isolation and placement.

 Course includes

  • One day Russian volume training
  • Volume Certificate upon completion
  • Lifetime of Mentorship from our Lash Trainers
  • Volume Lash Training Kit full of Lashing essentials valued over $200
  • Two sets of curved hand tested tweezers
  • Ultra Fine Mink Volume Lashes
  • Black Volume Adhesive
  • Lifetime 10% Discount at www.lashforless.com
  • Option to take additional Lash Lifting Training at discounted rate. 
  • Students are then eligible to purchase Flawless Lash Lift Training for only $50

CANCELLATION POLICY

Tuition is refundable (minus $500 deposit) up to 2 weeks prior to course start date.

Cancellations that are made prior to the 2 week mark are eligible to be rescheduled at a $150 administration fee which is subject to future course availability. 

 

 Tuition can be paid in installments. Please contact info@lashforless.com for more information. 

  

Course Includes:

  • A full day of training with the morning focusing on theory and the afternoon on practical application
  • Two sets of curved volume tweezers that have been hand tested by our trainers
  • Ultra fine Mink Volume Lashes
  • Black Volume Adhesive
  • Dlux Professional Eye Pads
  • A kit containing even more Lashing essentials. 

(Kits may vary)

entry.title: Private Classic Lash Training
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lash for Less
Type: training
Price: 1800.00

Private Classic Eyelash Extension Course  $1800

 *PRIVATE TRAINING LOCATED IN ALBERTA ONLY

NOTE:  AFTER PURCHASING TRAINER WILL BE IN CONTACT WITH YOU TO ARRANGE DAYS TO COVER YOUR PRIVATE COURSE. Contact info@lashforless.com if you would like to confirm date availability.  

This private course is perfect for anyone wanting a more one on one approach to classic lash training.  Two days required for certification. 

We are proud to offer this introductory course into the world of eyelash extensions.  With LFLs classic course students will be trained in all aspects of classic eyelash extensions and can feel confident they are ready to attempt lashing on their own.  This two day curriculum will cover theory as well as practical application on TWO live models. (Students are required to provide their own models)    Course cost $1800  With LFL you can feel confident that you are receiving the best Lash Education available with focus on high quality and safety.

  • A kit containing everything you will need to start your lashing career
  • A life time of mentor-ship from LFL Master Lash Trainers
  • A lifetime 10% discount with Lashforless.com on products
  • Discounted pricing for all future courses with LFL
  • After successful completion of two models and exam you will receive a certificate in Eyelash Extensions. 

(Kits may vary)

CANCELLATION POLICY

Tuition is refundable (minus $500 deposit) up to 2 weeks prior to course start date.

Cancellations that are made prior to the 2 week mark are eligible to be rescheduled at a $150 administration fee which is subject to future course availability. 

 

 Tuition can be paid in installments. Please contact info@lashforless.com for more information. 

 

Classic Course Outline

Day 1

Model is required to arrive by 12:45p.m. , to begin a full set at 1:00 p.m.  Models are to be wearing no eye make-up or contact lenses

 

  • Introduction to Lash Extensions
  • Lash/Eye Anatomy – Hair growth cycle
  • Product knowledge / Introduction to kits
  • Safety, sanitation, hygiene
  • Infection control
  • Allergies / adhesive theory
  • Initial application techniques
  • Core skills – design, placement, framing, picking up lashes, isolating
  • Technique tips / troubleshooting ( i.e.. banana peeling, unsticking glued lashes, flipping up)

*HANDS ON APPLICATION / PRACTICE ON MANNEQUIN

 

***LUNCH****

 

  • Client consultation, preparation, set-up
  • Client waiver / intake forms
  • Assessing lashes and conditions

 

*LIVE MODEL (first full set) (model should be prepared to lay with her eyes closed for up to 3 hours)

 

Day 2  

  • Recap of day 1 
  • Education on different eye shapes (Asian, Caucasian, droopy eyes, sagging lids, older eyes)
  • Popular lash design
  • Extension fills
  • Extension removals
  • Proper workstation set-up
  • Aftercare / maintenance
  • Pricing for profit
  • Licensing / Insurance

 

***LUNCH***

*LIVE MODEL (second full set) Practical Exam

Type: training
